00021 #include "FileOutput.h"
00022 #include "FileHeaderUpdater.h"
00023 #include "GenericDataHeaderUpdater.h"
00024 #include "ParameterNameValueType.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 
00029 #define WCHAR_T_SIZE 2
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Constructor
00033  */
00034 
00035 GenericDataHeaderUpdater::GenericDataHeaderUpdater()
00036 {
00037         os = 0;
00038         updateHdr = 0;
00039         currentHdr = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * Destructor
00044  */
00045 GenericDataHeaderUpdater::~GenericDataHeaderUpdater()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Update the file with the new GenericDataHeader information.
00051  */
00052 bool GenericDataHeaderUpdater::Update(std::ofstream& fileStream, GenericDataHeader& updateHeader, GenericDataHeader& currentHeader)
00053 {
00054         os = &fileStream;
00055         updateHdr = &updateHeader;
00056         currentHdr = &currentHeader;
00057 
00058         bool result = UpdateFileId();
00059         UpdateParameters();
00060         return result;
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Update the FileId.  Only update the FileId if update and current fileIDs are the same size.
00065  */
00066 bool GenericDataHeaderUpdater::UpdateFileId()
00067 {
00068         // Check if we can update the file Id; make sure the existing file Id is the same length as the new one
00069         if (currentHdr->GetFileId().length() == updateHdr->GetFileId().length() && updateHdr->GetFileId().length() != 0)
00070         {
00071                 // Move the file stream position to the location of the file ID.
00072                 int32_t offset = GetFileHeaderSize() + FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)currentHdr->GetFileTypeId().length();
00073                 os->seekp(offset, std::ios::beg);
00074 
00075                 // Write the new ID
00076                 FileOutput::WriteString8(*os, updateHdr->GetFileId());
00077 
00078                 return true;
00079         }
00080         else
00081                 return false;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * Update the parameter list.
00086  */
00087 void GenericDataHeaderUpdater::UpdateParameters()
00088 {
00089         int32_t filePos = GetFileHeaderSize() + GetBytesFromGenericDataHdrStartToParameterList();
00090 
00091         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00092         currentHdr->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00093         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = begin; ii != end; ++ii)
00094         {
00095                 // Add name length to file offset
00096                 filePos += FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)ii->GetName().length()*WCHAR_T_SIZE;
00097 
00098                 affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00099                 if (updateHdr->FindNameValParam(ii->GetName(), nvt))
00100                 {
00101                         // Check that the types match and the values are the same size
00102                         if (ii->GetParameterType() == nvt.GetParameterType()  && 
00103                                         ii->GetMIMEValue().Size() >= nvt.GetMIMEValue().Size())
00104                         {
00105                                 // Safe to update - move to filePos
00106                                 os->seekp(filePos, std::ios::beg);
00107 
00108                                 // Write value
00109                                 MIMEValue mv = nvt.GetMIMEValue();
00110                                 //existing value size
00111                                 u_int32_t size = ii->GetMIMEValue().Size();
00112                                 //new value size
00113                                 u_int32_t sz;
00114                                 const void* ptr = mv.GetValue(sz);
00115                                 //write the value with reserved size
00116                                 FileOutput::WriteBlob(*os, ptr, sz, size);
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 // Add Value length to offset
00121                 filePos += FIELD_LEN_SIZE + ii->GetMIMEValue().Size();
00122 
00123                 // Add type length to offset
00124                 filePos += FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)ii->GetMIMEType().size()*WCHAR_T_SIZE;
00125         }
00126 }
00127 
00128 /*
00129  * Get the size of the FileHeader in bytes.
00130  */
00131 int32_t GenericDataHeaderUpdater::GetFileHeaderSize()
00132 {
00133         return 2*sizeof(u_int8_t) + sizeof(u_int32_t) + sizeof(int32_t);
00134 }
00135 
00136 /*
00137  * Get the size of the GenericDataHeader up to the start of the parameter list.
00138  */
00139 int32_t GenericDataHeaderUpdater::GetBytesFromGenericDataHdrStartToParameterList()
00140 {
00141         return FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)currentHdr->GetFileTypeId().length() +
00142                 FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)currentHdr->GetFileId().length() +
00143                 FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)currentHdr->GetFileCreationTime().length()*WCHAR_T_SIZE +
00144                 FIELD_LEN_SIZE + (int32_t)currentHdr->GetLocale().length()*WCHAR_T_SIZE +
00145                 FIELD_LEN_SIZE;
00146 }
